synopsis.text: Maji ssuka!? fans rejoice as Kamiusagi Rope teams up with AU for a unique collaboration! Set at the culmination of the 4th season, these special episodes offer a fresh twist on the beloved series. Included on the first DVD release of Kamiusagi Rope: Warau Asa ni wa Fukuraitaru tte Maji ssuka!?, these episodes (numbered 18, 19, and 20) bring our favorite characters Rope and Akira face-to-face with cutting-edge cellular technology from the Japanese telecommunications giant, AU. Get ready for laughter, excitement, and a whole new perspective on modern technology in this thrilling anime crossover!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
